name: Hidden Object Games - Puzzle
description:
DO YOU LIKE DETECTIVE STORIES, MYSTERIES AND PUZZLES?
THEN YOU FOUND A PERFECT MATCH!

This is the best of hidden object games you can find!

The aim is to find all hidden objects in picture and solve the puzzle!

ARE YOU READY TO JOIN THE GREATEST JOURNEY?

= TRAIN YOUR BRAIN! - Use all detective observational skills and seek for 15+ objects in every picture!

= PLAY WITH YOUR KIDS! - Create your own dream-team in search of hidden objects!

= ENJOY VARIOUS THEMES! - Family, nature, detective, city, fun and scary!

= HAVE FUN! - Use tips to find all the objects faster!

If you know who are Sherlock Holmes, Hercule Poirot or Allan Pinkerton, you will definitely love that game!

Hidden Object Games - Puzzle is free to play and free to download!
